lead_paragraph: POINTING make-believe weapons at loving mothers, racing up and down the block uttering hideous cries, drilling with broomsticks, piling a planeload of "bombs" -- children are "playing war." Parents want them to stop.
abstract: Comment on s at Sarah Lawrence Nursery School on child war play
snippet: POINTING make-believe weapons at loving mothers, racing up and down the block uttering hideous cries, drilling with broomsticks, piling a planeload of "bombs" -- children are "playing war." Parents want them to stop....
